This in response to a problem reported by Kevin Radke.

msg: A/D/G instead of the entire A, makes the output shorter.

author: neels
msg: * subversion/tests/cmdline/merge_tests.py: Add a test for r38000 and r38006,
multiple tree-conflicts by a replace on merge, marked XFail, because
some output is still slightly wrong (the main issue is fixed though).

author: neels
msg: (TestFactory.print_script): Don't warn on comments in input.

author: neels
msg: Introducing a cmdline-test factory, which writes py tests that PASS,
given a sequence of pseudo-shell commands. (Read the top comment in new
(process_output_for_commit): ...this new function, for use in factory.py.
(get_wc_base_rev): New convenience function, used in factory.py.
(run_and_verify_svn2): Remove an obsolete check (checked just above).
(SVNTreeNode.print_script): Add two parameters PREPEND and DROP_EMPTIES.
Tweak output. Move some special parsing out into...
argument, used by factory.py to print to a string instead of stdout.
Count the prints. Add parameter WC_VARNAME.
